pr_title: Add ability to get groups by name with fields option (#786)

timeline.message: Add ability to get groups by name with fields option (#786)

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (fields.length > 0) {
if (fields != null && fields.length > 0) {
timeline.author: PJSimon

timeline.bodyHTML:
Can you please have the method above this one call this one?

public static Iterable<BoxGroup.Info> getAllGroupsByName(final BoxAPIConnection api, String name) {
     return getAllGroupsByName(api, name, null);
 }
timeline.author: PJSimon

replies.bodyText: @wadahiro Can you make this change please?  Then I'll be able to approve.  Thanks!
replies.author: PJSimon

replies.bodyText: @wadahiro Please disregard - my system wasn't refreshing or something.  I see the change now.  Thanks!
replies.author: PJSimon
